title: Jalosjos was sentenced to lifetime imprisonment by the Supreme Court in 2002 for raping an 11-year old girl in 1996
content: In December 1997, the Makati Regional Trial Court Branch 62 found Jalosjos guilty of two counts of statutory rape and six counts of acts of lasciviousness. He brought his case before the Supreme Court, but it affirmed his conviction in 2001 and 2002.
contentPreview: In December 1997, the Makati Regional Trial Court Branch 62 found Jalosjos guilty of two counts of statutory rape and six counts of acts of lasciviousness. He brought his case before the Supreme Court, but it affirmed his conviction in 2001 and 2002.
